import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get compatible target fields for mapping"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/entity-mappings/compatible-fields"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Given a source entity type and custom field, returns all compatible fields on the target entity that can be mapped to. Compatibility is determined by editor types and data types.

**Workflow:**
1. Call GET /entity-mappings/entity-types to get source entity and custom field IDs
2. Submit this request with source field and target entity type
3. Receive list of compatible fields on target entity
4. Use compatible field information when creating entity mappings

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to retrieve compatible target fields for a given source custom field. The service evaluates field compatibility based on editor types and data types to ensure valid mappings.","required":["SourceEntityTypeId","SourceCustomFieldTypeId","TargetEntityTypeId"],"properties":{"SourceEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type UUID of the source entity containing the custom field. Obtain via [GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings](/docs/api/sites/get-my-site-settings) and read `Item.EntityTypes[].EntityTypeId`.","example":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMySiteSettings","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings","responseField":"Item.EntityTypes[].EntityTypeId"}},"SourceCustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Custom field type UUID on the source entity to check compatibility for. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-field-types) and read `Items[].CustomFieldTypeId`.","example":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchCustomFieldTypes","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types","responseField":"Items[].CustomFieldTypeId"}},"TargetEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type UUID of the target entity to find compatible fields on. Obtain via [GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings](/docs/api/sites/get-my-site-settings) and read `Item.EntityTypes[].EntityTypeId`.","example":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMySiteSettings","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings","responseField":"Item.EntityTypes[].EntityTypeId"}}},"example":{"SourceEntityTypeId":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","SourceCustomFieldTypeId":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","TargetEntityTypeId":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789"},"title":"GetCustomFieldMappingCompatibleFieldsRequest"},"example":{"SourceEntityTypeId":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","SourceCustomFieldTypeId":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","TargetEntityTypeId":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
